response.overview: Kama, a Thai mail-order bride, moves to the U.S. with her new husband, Joseph Delaney, in search of the American dream. She soon discovers the world she hoped for is actually an emotional prison. Her only salvation is Joseph's unstable, other-worldly son, Billy. In order to escape this American nightmare, she will have to trust Billy to free her, even if it means someone must die...
response.title: Apparent Horizon
